content: "Create a stylized, digital art illustration of a futuristic bus flying through a bustling cityscape. The bus should be depicted with sleek, futuristic lines and advanced technologies, such as rocket engines and holographic displays. In the background, a variety of towering skyscrapers and other futuristic buildings should be visible, with a blur of movement and activity indicating the fast pace of the city. Use bold, vibrant colors and a highly detailed, realistic style to bring the scene to life."
